short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Trello plus more! Enhance your Trello experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Key Features

游릭 List Widths: Customize list widths globally for optimal screen usage.

游릭 List Controls: Expand or collapse lists individually, automatically or all at once.

游릭 List Work in Progress: Set a limit to the number of cards in a list. If exceeded, the list changes color.

游릭 List Persistent Settings: Your preferences for list width and expansion state are remembered across boards.

游릭 Card Counting: View card counts for individual lists and the entire board at a glance.

游릭 Card Aging: See how old each card is to prioritize tasks effectively.

游릭 Card ID Display: Easily view and access unique card identifiers for improved tracking and referencing.

游릭 Card Celebration: Celebrate task completion with a burst of confetti whenever you move a card to a list title that has a 游꾿 in it.

游릭 Card Estimation: Measure your workload by adding completed and total estimates.


Why Choose Trello Plus?

游리 Improved Visibility: Adjust your board layout to see exactly what you need.

游리 Enhanced Organization: Gain clear insights into your workload and task history.

游리 Time-Saving: Quickly find information and manage your board without manual adjustments.

游리 Seamless Integration: Works smoothly with your existing Trello boards.

游리 Efficient Referencing: Use Card IDs for precise communication about specific tasks.


游댮 Important

Trello will make future updates to the structure that Trello Plus depends on to function properly. When it does, Trello Plus will stop working.

Most extensions rely on a structure that may change and I have no control over that.

I will do my best to make sure Trello Plus is updated and working in-line with any Trello updates.

Please don't use the Chrome Web Store review system as a way to contact me.

You will find I'm open to feedback and suggestions and working with you to make Trello Plus better.

If Trello Plus consistently stops working for you and I am not aware of any update to Trello, please create a post on our community subreddit (r/trelloplus) on Reddit.


游댮 Browser Compatibility

Trello Plus supports the following Chromium-based browsers:

Chrome, Edge, Opera, Brave and Vivaldi

All other browsers are not supported.
